snippet: The 120-board final of the trial to select the United States open team for this year’s World Mind Sports Games was played on Saturday and Sunday in Schaumburg, Ill.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the 120-board final of the trial to select the United States open team for the 2012 World Mind Sports Games in Schaumburg, Ill.
lead_paragraph: The 120-board final of the trial to select the United States open team for this year’s World Mind Sports Games was played on Saturday and Sunday in Schaumburg, Ill.

headline.seo: Bridge - U.S. Open Team Trial for World Mind Sports Games
headline.main: U.S. Open Team Trial for World Mind Sports Games
